name: Warhammer: Battle for Atluma
overview: Warhammer: Battle for Atluma delivers an extensive card game experience on the PSP. Enter the old world and battle your way through the armies of the Grand Alliance or the evil Hordes of Darkness. Discover the secrets of Atluma as you collect more than 450 cards. Just be quick -- you'll have to use all your wits and strategy to beat your opponent to the ultimate goal, the Atluma Crystal.
